授業目的: The purpose of this course is to improve fluency skills.
到達目標: Students will be able to speak with greater fluency.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: Each week, students will receive a 15 minute lecture about how to improve fluency skills. Then the class will be a group discussion or pair discussion. Students will be speaking for at least 60 minutes per class.

第1回: Each week, students should prepare for the next discussion.

Lecture - Adjacency pairs.
Discussion - Which part of Japan would you prefer to live in?
Each week, students should prepare for the next discussion.

Each week, students should prepare for the next discussion.

Discussion - What is your favorite season?
Each week, students should prepare for the next discussion.

Each week, students should prepare for the next discussion.
